title: What Does “BBG” Mean on TikTok & Over Text?

steps.title: BBG usually means “baby girl.”
steps.content: BBG usually means “baby girl.” This use of the slang abbreviation can come from close friends or romantic interests. Say you’re texting a group of your girlfriends—they might send “bbg” at the end of a text as a sense of endearment. If you’re texting a love interest or your partner, they might address you as “bbg” in a message when sweet-talking you. [1] X Research source You’ll likely see this use of the acronym on TikTok.

steps.title: BBG can also mean “better be going.”
steps.content: BBG can also mean “better be going.” If you’re having a casual conversation and someone signs off with “bbg,” they’re probably using it in this context. This is a quick and polite way to say, “Hey, I gotta go, but it was nice chatting with you!” [2] X Research source

steps.title: In some cases, BBG stands for “beautiful baby girl.”
steps.content: In some cases, BBG stands for “beautiful baby girl.” If your crush, partner, or special someone sends you a message with “bbg” in it, they’re likely [[Tell-if-He's-Flirting|flirting. They’re saying you’re beautiful—they probably like you too! [3] X Research source Keep in mind that this isn’t a definitive confirmation that they like you or have romantic feelings for you. At the end of the day, “bbg” is simply an endearing sentiment.

steps.title: “Baby Girl” Meaning Examples
steps.content: “Baby Girl” Meaning Examples BBG you’re the cutest! Don’t listen to him! Thanks, bbg! You’re the best 🫶 Hey, bbg. Got any plans tonight? 😏 BBG, you have the most amazing eyes.

steps.title: “Better Be Going” Meaning Examples
steps.content: “Better Be Going” Meaning Examples It’s been great catching up, but I bbg. BBG! I’ll talk to you soon! We bbg if we want to make it to the movies on time. BBG THE CONCERT STARTS IN 1 HOUR

steps.title: “Beautiful Baby Girl” Meaning Examples
steps.content: “Beautiful Baby Girl” Meaning Examples You’re my bbg, you know that? BBG, there’s no one I’d rather talk to 😉 I love you bbg BBG, you have my heart 😘
